short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the "overdue" section on schoology!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The overdue section on Schoology is a prime example of good in theory, bad in practice. This is because many assignments are not intended to be turned in on Schoology, causing the overdue column to become very long, very quickly. This extension removes that column entirely, letting you get to work faster!
